sentence: Eventually returned we gave our orders but no drinks menu

Also while I was having breakfast in the hotel restaurant the manager approached a table of two guests and told them they needed to move from the four top table they chose to sit at even though the restaurant was empty and had plenty of available tables

My room was not as spick and span as before specifically the bathroom cleaning had some gaps my complimentary mini bar coffee was not refilled the next day very important and when I called for the wrong refill was brought initially etc
I had all my meals at SOKO restaurant
It actually feels like 2 different hotels restaurant groups
On my second visit because they got their signature dish so wrong I decided to go simple and get a beef burger and even that did not come with all ingredients listed
Second night I ordered with a waiter and 15 minutes later I did not have my drink even though the bar was basically empty I had to go to the barman and order it myself
We are definitely looking forward to visiting the SOI restaurant at DusitD2 Nairobi again
If this is how they treat their guests there is no way I am eating another meal here during our stay
Some confusion with room service and incorrect timings on menus for room service
Staff was friendly all was well apart from SOKO breakfast
The breakfast was amazing with a wide variety
I dined with my Aunt and cousin
The selection for cocktails was just magnificent
Jeremy that is the name to remember when you dine at Soi Restaurant
Had the best birthday and dinner thank you Dusit
The restaurants offer really good servicethe food is quite nice although pricey
The bar and restaurant are amazing too and the food is great
Went to the den the food was delicious very very well done and all on the menu was good
End year Dinner With Friends
